The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
Please be aware that the school uniform shop will be closed from 31st March to 7th April. If you would like to purchase uniform items for your children this term, please do so before 12 noon, 28th March. Normal opening hours will resume from 7th April.
If you require further information, please contact rainbow@bsg.org.cn directly.
Best wishes,
Rainbow
The British School of Guangzhou
